Headline: #75 74th-75th Temporary Reroute at 75th/Paxton
ShortDescription: 75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Jeffrey, 76th, Yates and 75th due to, street blockage near 75th/Paxton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 75th, Jeffrey, 76th, Yates and 75th due to, street blockage near 75th/Paxton.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute near 79th/Cottage Grove
ShortDescription: 79 79th buses temp. rerouted WB: 79th, Drexel, 81st, Cottage Grove, and 79th; EB: 79th, Cottage Grove, 76th, Drexel and 79th due to, street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 79th/Cottage Grove, due to street blockage.

Westbound buses will operate via 79th, Drexel, 81st, Cottage Grove, and 79th,

Eastbound buses will operate via 79th, Cottage Grove, 76th, Drexel and 79th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #87 87th Temporary Reroute near 87th/Lafayette
ShortDescription: Updated: 87 87th buses temp. rerouted WB: 87th, Lafayette, 95th, Halsted & 87th; EB: 87th, Halsted, Vincennes, 83rd, Lafayette & 87th due to, street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 87th/Lafayette, due to street blockage.

Westbound buses will operate via 87th, Lafayette, 95th, Halsted and 87th.

Eastbound buses will operate via 87th, Halsted, Vincennes, 83rd, Lafayette and 87th.

Allow extra travel time.
